description: This Java source file contains multiple Spring Boot REST controller classes for a backend web service. The controllers handle user authentication, user profile retrieval, log entry management, summaries, integrations, activity feed, and analytics. Each controller is annotated with REST mappings and Swagger/OpenAPI annotations, indicating their role in exposing API endpoints for the frontend or other clients.

classes.name: AuthController
classes.description: Handles user registration and login for JWT token issuance.

classes.name: UserController
classes.description: Provides endpoints for retrieving current user profile.

classes.name: LogEntryController
classes.description: CRUD endpoints for log entries related to the user.

classes.name: SummaryController
classes.description: Generates or retrieves stand-up summaries based on log entries.

classes.name: IntegrationController
classes.description: Lists and connects user to available integrations.

classes.name: ActivityController
classes.description: Provides a paginated activity feed for the user.

classes.name: AnalyticsController
classes.description: Provides daily analytics records and trends.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Creates a new user account during registration.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Returns the profile of the currently authenticated user.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new log entry for the user.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists paginated log entries for the current user.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves a stand-up summary or generates a new one for the user.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Connects the current user to an external integration.

methods.name: daily
methods.description: Returns daily analytics data over a specified date range.
